attributes.action: No UK Money to Bail Out Eurozone
attributes.additional_details:
We demand that the British government holds a referendum to decide whether British taxpayers’ money should be given to the International Monetary Fund to bail out countries in the Eurozone whose economies have collapsed, or are collapsing.

We declare our opposition to the Coalition’s current proposals to make several billion pounds sterling available to the IMF for such a purpose.  The government has no mandate from the British people to squander public money in this way.  We must be consulted first.
